channel.title: Mph
channel.description:
Ok i made a new plate I got the armour ints put in the wear model(only wear model no point in a drop model to me.) and I put the model in and everything, then i logged onto my client sais add model 12056(or w/e the model was) and then tried to pick it up i lagged and my whole client stopeed and an error like this popped up, (and yes it wont let me log in anymore prolly cause of the item idk.)
[code] Sk1ttlezrule43v RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:121) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:6560) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:6432) at client.method105(client.java:8229) at client.method36(client.java:1583) at client.method102(client.java:7918) at client.method9(client.java:8812) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4566) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
also here are my ints that I tried
[code] if(i == 4225) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = -1; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 12056;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 12056;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Angel PLate v1";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "very elegant".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
also the model is an attachement see if you can fet it to work then send me what ever it or or just tell me and I will fix myself.

item.title: Mph
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“movieman0, post:8, topic:261025”]I have this same problem, may i ask what you did to fix it?

Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16501
at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:121)
at Class8.method201(Class8.java:6291)
at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub2.method444(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub2.java:12)
at Class30_Sub2_Sub4.method443(Class30_Sub2_Sub4.java:9)
at Class25.method314(Class25.java:1408)
at Class25.method313(Class25.java:1143)
at client.method146(client.java:11907)
at client.method102(client.java:7686)
at client.method9(client.java:8581)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122)
at client.run(client.java:4377)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/quote]

The model id is too high, in your models folder, find the file “16501”, and rename it to something between the numbers of 8000 and 15000.

Read full topic
